modName: Layer Bikini by anano Conversion to UNPB BBP BBPx
summary: This is a conversion of anano's Layer Bikini for UNPB/UNPB-BBP/UNPB-BBPx It requires anano's original mod. This is only Mesh and Weight changes for the UNPB body type. Working weight slider.
descriptionHtml:
This is a conversion of anano's Layer Bikini for UNPB/UNPB-BBP/UNPB-BBPx It requires anano's original mod. This is only Mesh and weight changes for the UNPB body type. Working weight slider.

Install anano's mod first [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/7736]Layer Bikini - UNP and CBBE[/url] then overwrite the two mesh files for the body type you want.

BBP version require
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/20227 ]UNPB-BBP[/url]

Thanks to anano for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/7736]Layer Bikini - UNP and CBBE[/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709]dimon99's UNP Body[/url]

UNPB body
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/20227]TroubleMakers Clothing UNPB also BBP and BBPx - UNPB Body Main Page[/url]

Thanks to Phygit
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3666]FemFeet[/url]

=================================
My Skyrim SE mod

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/3592]MTM - UNPB Body - Clothes - Armor - Repository [/url]

=================================
